sentence: After  93  days  of  war,  Palestinian  health  officials  say  more  than  23,000  people  in  Gaza  have  been  killed  in  Israel's  bombardments  and  ground  operations  in  response  to  the  Oct.  7  Hamas-led  attacks,  which  killed  1,200  people  and  seized  240  hostages.

After  93  days  of  war,  Palestinian  health  officials  say  more  than  23,000  people  in  Gaza  have  been  killed  in  Israel's  bombardments  and  ground  operations  in  response  to  the  Oct.  7  Hamas-led  attacks,  which  killed  1,200  people  and  seized  240  hostages.
